replies.body:
next time you should add a poll.

go ahead and buy jinx, once it gets to late game or she gets ahead the game is pretty much over, as long as you're not a spastic.

XD
ive seen em i want the firecracker 1 lol

jinx is a very good champion if you know how to play her and are good at farming 

take it from me i main jinx ( own all 3 skins cos i have no life ) jinx is a champion that fits into most team comps she is strong all game round as long as you dont mess up that much but she does take some time to master {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
